Detailed Description

template<typename T>
struct v8pp::persistent< T >

Moveable unique V8 persistent handle. Due to v8::Global has no move constructor and assign operator defined, it cannot be stored in std::map, std::unordered_map. To resolve this issue add move support in dervied class. See https://groups.google.com/d/topic/v8-users/KV_LZqz41Ac/discussion
